g.title: cluster_n__Users_jamie_Coding_Sourceflow_sourceflow_main_py
g.text: This module serves as the main entry point for the Code Project Analyzer application.

g.title: cluster_n__Users_jamie_Coding_Sourceflow_sourceflow_core_explorer_py
g.text: This module is responsible for traversing the directory structure of a code project, identifying relevant code files, and filtering out non-code files and irrelevant directories.

g.title: cluster_n__Users_jamie_Coding_Sourceflow_sourceflow_core_analyzer_py
g.text: A module for analyzing code files using AI.

g.title: cluster_n__Users_jamie_Coding_Sourceflow_sourceflow_core_builder_py
g.text: This module is responsible for aggregating analysis results across files, building cross-file dependency and call graphs, and identifying entry points and major execution paths.

g.title: cluster_n__Users_jamie_Coding_Sourceflow_sourceflow_core_visualizer_py
g.text: This module generates visual representations of code structure, dependencies, and execution flows from analysis results. It supports visual outputs in multiple formats, namely Graphviz and Mermaid.

g.title: main
g.text: Main entry point for the CLI application.

g.title: analyze_project
g.text: Analyze a code project and generate visualizations.

g.title: __init__
g.text: Initializes the DirectoryExplorer with configurable settings.

g.title: explore
g.text: Recursively explores the directory structure starting from root_dir.

g.title: get_file_stats
g.text: Generates statistics about the identified code files.

g.title: count_tokens
g.text: Counts the number of tokens in the given text.

g.title: _create_prompt
g.text: Creates the prompt for the AI agent.

g.title: _parse_response
g.text: Parses the AI agent's JSON response.

g.title: _analyze_code
g.text: Sends the code to the AI agent for analysis.

g.title: _analyze_large_file
g.text: Analyzes a large file by chunking it into smaller pieces.

g.title: add_file_analysis
g.text: Add a file's analysis results to the relationship builder.

g.title: get_function_details
g.text: Get details for a specific function.

g.title: get_functions_by_file
g.text: Get all functions defined in a specific file.

g.title: get_function_callers
g.text: Get all functions that call a specific function.

g.title: get_function_callees
g.text: Get all functions called by a specific function.

g.title: get_entry_point_paths
g.text: Get the major execution paths starting from entry points.

g.title: _trace_path_from
g.text: Trace a path starting from a specific function.

g.title: get_summary
g.text: Get a summary of the analysis results.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator.__init__
g.text: Initializes the visualization generator with output directory and formats.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator._check_graphviz
g.text: Checks if Graphviz is installed by looking for the 'dot' executable.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator.generate_function_diagram
g.text: Generates function call diagrams using data from a builder.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator.generate_dependency_diagram
g.text: Generates module/file dependency diagrams using builder data.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator.generate_execution_path_diagram
g.text: Generates execution path diagrams based on entry points.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator._generate_mermaid
g.text: Generates Mermaid syntax for function call diagrams.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator._generate_dependency_mermaid
g.text: Generates Mermaid syntax for file dependency diagrams.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator._generate_execution_path_mermaid
g.text: Generates Mermaid syntax for execution path diagrams.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator.export_data
g.text: Exports analysis data to a JSON file.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator._sanitize_name
g.text: Sanitizes names for use in Graphviz and Mermaid.

g.title: VisualizationGenerator._wrap_text
g.text: Wraps text for Mermaid diagrams to fit within specified width.
